title: Tony Stark Headcanon
body: Through a couple pieces of dialogue and some common sense, we can make an educated guess that Tony was bullied heavily at school. In Iron Man 2, Tony spends some time talking with a kid. He asks the kid “The kid that bullies you at school. What’s his name?” Harley responds with “How’d you know that?” Tony obviously recognizes the signs of a kid being bullied. Tony then offers Harley a temporary solution, to keep him from being beat up, and the discussion pretty much ends. Now what we don’t know is exactly why Tony was bullied. However, we can put two and two together. Maybe he was bullied because his dad was so famous and people tend to be jealous. Maybe he was bullied because he had skipped a lot of grades, and was labeled a nerd. No matter the reason, it doesn’t take a lot of time to figure out that he was absolutely bullied and pushed around. Now imagine him coming home from school with a black eye, crying so hard he can hardly breathe cause some kids beat him up on his way back from school and broke his science project. Now imagine Howard telling him to stop being a baby, and telling Tony’s mom to handle it. Imagine Tony sobbing as Maria, his mom, helps to ice his face. Imagine his mom and dad getting into a huge fight about how to deal with it, so Tony decides he doesn’t want to be the reason they fight. So he decides to build something to deal with it so he doesn’t have to bother anyone anymore. So he knows what Harley’s going through, and he’s not gonna let it go. So he helps this kid. cause that’s all he wanted his parents to do, and he’s gonna break the cycle. Thanks for coming to my ted talk.

summary: peter, rolling through the tower on his heelies, wearing clout goggles that are too small and eating a fruit by the foot: let’s...
body:
peter, rolling through the tower on his heelies, wearing clout goggles that are too small and eating a fruit by the foot: let’s get this bread, ladies!!

tony, bags under his eyes, holding some red bull/coffee concoction: kid-

shuri, flying by on a razor scooter at top speed, furby tucked into her arm, also wearing clout goggles: NO SCOOTERS TO THE ANKLE TODAY, KIDS

tony:

tony sighs, then proceeds to down the rest of his drink in one gulp

summary: Chapter 2 of Provide Me is up!
title: Chapter 2 of Provide Me is up!
body:
Woooo! De-aged Tony Stark fic with ensemble cast. Read here!

Excerpt from chapter 1:

Someone had taken his designs down.

He blinked, vision blurry with sleep. The view remained the same - a blank, white ceiling. No schematics. No blueprints.

He sat up, heart thudding in his chest. Was he in trouble? If his designs had been taken down –

His tummy squeezed tight as he realized this wasn’t his room at all.

This wasn’t even home.

This room was huge, easily three times the size of his bedroom. The bed was massive, with shiny black covers - he could see his feet poking up, not even a quarter of the way down. The wall to his right was a dark red, the ones in front and behind of him white - and to his left …

Tony swallowed past a lump in his throat as he looked out of a huge window, onto a city that was too bright, too tall, too impossible.

He was a long, long way from home.

***

“Captain Rogers.”

Steve looked up from the coffee machine, slightly embarrassed that he’d moved Tony’s AI to pity, but more relieved than anything else.

“Jarvis, hello, uh.” He cleared his throat. “So I’m aiming for a black -“

“There is another matter which requires your attention, although I would be happy to prepare some coffee for you.”

“Uh - right, thanks, that’s -“ Steve put the cup down, grimacing at the cracks in the handle. “What’s up?”

“Mr Stark appears to have undergone a transformation overnight.”

Steve blinked. No further information was forthcoming.

“A transfor - sorry, Jarvis, you’re going to have to give me a hand here.“

“He appears, to all intents and purposes, to be a seven-year-old boy.” Steve braced his hands against the kitchen counter, and sighed.

“Tony … OK, very funny, but also, very early in the morning. If you could hold off until -“

“I assure you, Captain, this is no joke,” Jarvis interjected, sounding slightly stressed. “It is against my programming to lie.“

“Right,” Steve snorted, gingerly picking up the cup, now full of hot coffee. “If this is a ploy to get coffee delivered, I’m surprised he doesn’t have a machine in his room.”

“Captain Rogers, I assure you -“

“Right, Tony, I’m coming, I’m coming,” Steve grumbled, heading toward the elevator to the personal levels. “Honestly, your dependence on this stuff, anyway …“

He faltered a little in his stride when the elevator doors opened to reveal Natasha, her brow furrowed.

“Nat?”

“Did Jarvis call you?”

“Yes - well, I sort of assumed it was Tony -“ Nat shook her head.

“No, I don’t think he’d mess with me. He values his limbs too much.” She smiled. “I was mid work-out, though, so if this does turn out to be a ruse, I’m all warmed up and ready to push him through something glass and replaceable.” Steve stepped in alongside her.

“You can’t seriously be suggesting that he’s a child?”

“Figuratively? Absolutely. Literally? Well … those were actual Nazi dinosaurs we fought last week.” The elevator doors opened on Tony’s floor.

“Where’s everyone else?” Steve directed to the ceiling, beginning to accept that this was how his morning was starting. They headed for Tony’s bedroom.

“You are the two on site I thought proper to inform,” Jarvis said. “Mr. Barton is perhaps not best suited to the sensitivity of this situation, and I deemed it unwise to put undue, unexpected pressure on Dr. Banner.” Steve raised an eyebrow.

“Well, now I’m concerned.”

“We’re also the best looking,” Natasha said, smirking at Steve. “Maybe this is his way of propositioning us for a threesome.”

“Are you -“ Steve stammered, heat flooding his face, “Do people really -“ Nat laughed and slapped him on the back, which he didn’t find reassuring at all. She reached for the door.

“If I may,” Jarvis said. “Captain, I thought you should be informed, but I believe it would be wiser for you to initially remain outside. Ms. Romanov will be better received.” Steve frowned, and took a step back. He felt adrenaline begin to prickle his skin. That did sound more like Jarvis than Tony. Nat’s eyes narrowed.

“If there actually is a child in here, Jarvis, I hope you’re not suggesting it needs ‘a woman’s touch.’”

“I can assure you, Ms. Romanov, the situation is rather more complicated than that.”

“Isn’t it always,” Nat muttered, pushing open the door.

Read more

@noakanoa

“Yes - well, I sort of assumed it was Tony -“ Nat shook her head.

“No, I don’t think he’d mess with me. He values his limbs too much.” She smiled. “I was mid work-out, though, so if this does turn out to be a ruse, I’m all warmed up and ready to push him through something glass and replaceable.” Steve stepped in alongside her.

“You can’t seriously be suggesting that he’s a child?”

“Figuratively? Absolutely. Literally? Well … those were actual Nazi dinosaurs we fought last week.” The elevator doors opened on Tony’s floor.

“Where’s everyone else?” Steve directed to the ceiling, beginning to accept that this was how his morning was starting. They headed for Tony’s bedroom.

“You are the two on site I thought proper to inform,” Jarvis said. “Mr. Barton is perhaps not best suited to the sensitivity of this situation, and I deemed it unwise to put undue, unexpected pressure on Dr. Banner.” Steve raised an eyebrow.

“Well, now I’m concerned.”

“We’re also the best looking,” Natasha said, smirking at Steve. “Maybe this is his way of propositioning us for a threesome.”

“Are you -“ Steve stammered, heat flooding his face, “Do people really -“ Nat laughed and slapped him on the back, which he didn’t find reassuring at all. She reached for the door.

“If I may,” Jarvis said. “Captain, I thought you should be informed, but I believe it would be wiser for you to initially remain outside. Ms. Romanov will be better received.” Steve frowned, and took a step back. He felt adrenaline begin to prickle his skin. That did sound more like Jarvis than Tony. Nat’s eyes narrowed.

“If there actually is a child in here, Jarvis, I hope you’re not suggesting it needs ‘a woman’s touch.’”

“I can assure you, Ms. Romanov, the situation is rather more complicated than that.”

“Isn’t it always,” Nat muttered, pushing open the door.

Read more

@noakanoa

blog.name: lemonsandstrawberries
blog.title: Stony fics blog
blog.description:
A blog dedicated to Stony (Steve Rogers x Tony Stark, Marvel) fanfiction and Stony in general (mostly tickle fics). Will contain a lot of fics, some stony posts and some private whining and all the good stuff! Browse the masterpost, read fics, and enjoy your stay!

NOT ACCEPTING PROMPTS
MASTERPOST

title: Raspberry for Iron Man
body:
fandom: Stony (Steve x Tony), MCU

summary:  Steve sees a raspberry flavored jelly with Iron Man armor on it and buys it for Tony, forming an evil plan of a tickle attack in his head.

length: 926 words

a/n: inspired by this prompt! one of my headcanons is that Tony is very raspberry ticklish and with teasing Steve it was a lot of fun to write. hope you will like it!

——————–

Raspberry for Iron Man

“What do you have for me?”

Steve smiled, hearing the teasing voice and feeling his boyfriend leaning on his back. He was probably enjoying too much the thought that Tony had to stand on his toes and put his chin on Steve’s shoulder to peer down at the table and the big brown bags with grocery shopping.

“And why do you think I bought something for you?” Steve asked back, turning his face a little bit to look at the other man.

“Uhhh, because you love me very much and can’t stop thinking about me?” Tony answered with a teasing grin. The answer should be obvious, really.

“Hmmmm. Actually, I do have something for you,” Steve nodded, putting his hand into the bag and laying down the items.

“Ha, knew it,” Tony said proudly, his smile dropping when Steve waved a piece of broccoli in front of his face.

“It is broccoli season! Guess what is for dinner!” Steve announced cheerfully.

“Please have a  steak in there, please say steak, please say steak…” Tony chanted quietly and Steve laughed. He continued to put the items out, showing cauliflower (probably to go with the broccoli), cereal (some organic ones that tasted like cardboard and Tony liked Steve a whole lot less), full-fat milk (Tony liked Steve again), more broccoli…

“Okay! You are clearly testing my patience!” Tony called, squeezing himself in front of Steve and digging into the bags on his own, feeling that there had to be something good. Like an expensive piece of cheese. Maybe some tasty cheddar. Or aged parmesan. If he was going to eat broccoli, he needed cheese to it, because put broccoli and cheese on one plate and you had heaven.

Steve let Tony wriggle between him and the table, reversing their position and wrapping hands around his boyfriend’s waist. He didn’t need to stand on his toes and put his chin on Tony’s shoulder without any problem, waiting until Tony would get to the item Steve bought especially for him.

Tomato paste. Bag of pasta. Yes! Hello, parmesan. Baby carrots. And…

Tony frowned, taking out a packet of jello and looking at it.

“Huh,” he stated, “I don’t remember approving this,” he said, looking at the square packet of raspberry jelly. It was a regular yellow box, with a raspberry in the left corner, promising great flavor and no artificial coloring. Just in the bottom right corner was an image of Iron Man, exactly MK 50, with spread out nano booster wings.

“I had to buy it,” Steve smiled, pressing his cheek to Tony’s. “Don’t you love it?”

“So, jello for dessert?” Tony joked, turning the box in his hands. “I don’t know. It is nice, I guess? Everything with my suit on is great. Just why raspberry?”

“I think it is very fitting for you,” Steve shrugged, discreetly repositioning his hands around Tony’s waist, holding him in a more snuggly hold.

“You think? Because I think they made it raspberry because my suit is red. Which is a major fail on the marketing team’s behalf, because everyone knows that my favorite fruit is bluebe— EEEP!”

Tony didn’t finish. He dropped the jello when Steve pressed lips to his cheek and blew a loud raspberry.

“HIHIHIHI!” Tony shrilled, trying to wriggle away, but he was squeezed to Steve who didn’t leave him much room to move. “NO! STEHEHIHIHIVE!”

“Awww,” Steve cooed, smiling impossibly big and pressing his lips to Tony’s cheeks, chin, and jawline, blowing more raspberries. “Someone is raspberry ticklish,” he said in a low, pleasant murmur.

“No no no! Stahp! Stahahahap!” Tony continued to laugh, as more raspberries were blown on his skin, this time on his neck. “Nooohihihihi!!”

“Mmmmm. You even taste like raspberries. I think that the marketing team did a great job.”

“Stahahahap! Nohahahat fair”

“Oh, I am sorry. I forgot you are too sensitive when it comes to raspberries. Like, raspberries really, really tickle you, don’t they?”

“Staahahaahap saying thahat!”

“Saying what? Raspberries or tickle?”

“Both! Both!”

“Both? You want me to do both?”

“No!”

“Okay then!”

“NO! I said— PPPPHHIHIHIHI!!”

Tony was lost in laughter. Steve was scribbling fingers against his belly and blowing raspberries into his neck and cheeks, and he could only laugh and try to fall to the floor in an attempt to escape, without any luck. He was trapped. It really was a trap. He could exactly picture Steve spotting the jello in the shop, putting it into the cart with a wicked smile, forming an evil plan in his head and waiting for Tony to fall into his clutches. Damn his curious nature. The raspberry tickle attack would continue, if Tony didn’t flail his arm in a desperate move and knock down the bag with groceries, making the contents spill out all over the table. The ruckus made Steve stop, while something else caught Tony’s attention.

Cherry for Spider-man. Lime for Hulk. And…

“Well!” Tony burst out, pushing himself away from Steve just to press himself back, face to face. He was feeling weak and giddy but had a sudden boost of energy when he saw Steve’s startled face. “Let’s see if you taste like blueberries!”

Steve screeched and almost doubled over when soft lips pressed to his neck and blew a loud raspberry in revenge. That damned goatee.

“Get back here, Rogers!” Tony called with a laugh, as Steve zoomed out of the kitchen, Tony immediately following.

Blueberry for Captain America. Tony changed his mind and decided that the marketing team did a great job after all.

“Uhhh, because you love me very much and can’t stop thinking about me?” Tony answered with a teasing grin. The answer should be obvious, really.

blog.name: wisegamora
blog.description: icon from  kjibs on deviant art, banner gif by @theavengers marvel blog Tony Stark centric

tags: you're all i have too you know
i don't have anyone but you
title: all that i wanted
body:
The curve of the earth tells me some things they won’t be changing


The North Star, the dipper, the oceans and deserts


But over my shoulder everything’s ashes and ruin


Stretched out before me is shadows and broken white lines

The curve of your neck and the kisses you gave in the morning
The sound of my name leaving your mouth
All of it gone now, blowing like dust on the highway
Time may erase me, but one thing will remain

All that I wanted was you

blog.name: sound-of-random
blog.title: I Care A Normal Amount
blog.description: Hello! My name is Myra. There will be mostly just Stephen Colbert and the late night gang! Also rants about my problems with the world...

body:

summary: 5 times Peter almost called Tony dad and 1 time he did
title: 5 times Peter almost called Tony dad and 1 time he did
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2PzE80r

by pomerasin

“so when are you going to finally call him dad?” Peter choked on nothing
basically, 5 times Peter almost calls Tony dad and 1 time he finally does

blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: iv. "no, stop!"
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2yQ7y0H

by bowlingfornerds

The footsteps had slowed to a stop and Peter could hear the gunner’s breathing, could hear their fingers tapping against the gun. He gritted his teeth. He couldn’t let people get hurt – not when he had a better chance of surviving. But moving would attract the gunner to their class.

In the end, it didn’t matter.

There was a gunman in his school and he’d come for Peter.

Words: 1498, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 4 of it’s okay, we’re okay [whumpvember 2018]

  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Blood, Guns, Violence, Whump
